# API

NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://your-backend-domain.com

# -------------------------
# BRANDING
# -------------------------

# -------------------------
# AUTH
# -------------------------
NEXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_MODE=jwt

# -------------------------
# BUILD
# -------------------------
NODE_ENV=production
